H0.text: Corolla is the term for all of the petals together.

H1.text: Stamen are all of the petals together.

H2.text: Anthers are all of the petals together.

H3.text: Stalk is the term used for all of the petals together.

A4.text: The petals, collectively called the corolla

A5.text: male stamens, where pollen is presented
